bibl.title: Echo and Quotation of the New Testament in Papyrus Letters to the End of the Fourth Century.

series.title: Texts and Editions for New Testament Study.

bibl.title: New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World
bibl.author: CHOAT, Malcolm

bibl.note: Definitions and Methodology. - Citations as Testimony to the Text of the New Testament. - Echo or Citation as an Indicator of Christianity. - Context and Implications. - Pp. 284-285: Table I: Citations; - 286-287: Table II: Quotation or Clear Allusion; - 288-291: Table III: Word or Phrase in Religious Context; - 292: Table IV: Word or Phrase not in Religious Context.
